title: Design and Development of Multimedia Video Lectures for Advanced Language Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in Basic Language Skills and Practical Application Experience
context.additional_context: An advanced language competency enhancement course for in-service practitioners, with multimedia learning principle-based video lecture design as the core. Learners access content via LMS in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply language-specific professional communication strategies with 80% or higher accuracy
Learners can reproduce core concepts presented in multimedia-based lectures with 90% or higher accuracy
Learners can produce language usage examples tailored to practical contexts with 75% or higher completeness
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
